meanings.meaning_en_US: A building devoted to the worship or considered to be the dwelling place of a deity.

examples.sentence: The ancient [temple] was a site of pilgrimage.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這座古老的寺廟是朝聖的地方。

examples.sentence: Visitors are expected to remove their shoes before entering the [temple].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 進入寺廟前，訪客需脫鞋。

examples.sentence: A beautiful garden surrounds the [temple].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 寺廟周圍有一個美麗的花園。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To direct one's gaze in a specified direction.

examples.sentence: Please [look] at the board.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請看黑板。

examples.sentence: She turned to [look] at him.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她轉身看著他。

examples.sentence: The dog seemed to [look] for something.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那隻狗似乎在找東西。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The act of directing one's gaze or the appearance of someone or something.

examples.sentence: He had a serious [look] on his face.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的臉上有一個嚴肅的表情。

examples.sentence: Her [look] was very stylish.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的外觀非常時尚。

examples.sentence: I love the cozy [look] of this room.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我喜歡這個房間舒適的外觀。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having good luck; fortunate.

examples.sentence: She feels [lucky] to have such good friends.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她覺得擁有如此好的朋友很幸運。

examples.sentence: He won the lottery and considers himself [lucky].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他中了彩券，認為自己很幸運。

examples.sentence: I had a [lucky] break during the interview.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我在面試中有了一次幸運的機會。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To move past or through something.

examples.sentence: Please [pass] me the salt.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請把鹽遞給我。

examples.sentence: We didn't [pass] the test this time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們這次沒有通過測試。

examples.sentence: He will [pass] through the tunnel soon.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他很快就會通過隧道。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The third month of the year in the Gregorian calendar.

examples.sentence: My birthday is in [March].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我的生日在三月

examples.sentence: [March] often brings the first signs of spring.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 三月通常帶來春天的最初跡象

examples.sentence: The event will take place in [March].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該活動將於三月舉行

meanings.meaning_en_US: With each other; in proximity or in company.

examples.sentence: We worked [together] to finish the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們一起完成了這個項目。

examples.sentence: They enjoy spending time [together].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們喜歡一起度過時光。

examples.sentence: The team came [together] for the big game.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 團隊為了大賽而集合在一起。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A title used before the surname or full name of a man.

examples.sentence: Please help me, [Mister]!
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請幫我，先生！

examples.sentence: Mr. Smith is a respectable [Mister] in our town.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 史密斯先生是我們鎮上一位受人尊敬的先生。

examples.sentence: Excuse me, [Mister], do you have the time?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 不好意思，先生，你知道幾點了嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: The amount that needs to be paid or spent to buy or obtain something.

examples.sentence: The total [cost] of the project was higher than expected.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個項目的總成本高於預期

examples.sentence: Do you know the [cost] of this item?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你知道這件商品的成本嗎？

examples.sentence: They didn't consider the hidden [cost] of the service.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們沒有考慮到服務的隱藏成本

meanings.meaning_en_US: To exert force on (someone or something) to move them away from oneself.

examples.sentence: Please [push] the door to open it.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請推門打開它。

examples.sentence: He had to [push] the car to get it started.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他必須推車以使其啟動。

examples.sentence: She [pushed] herself to finish the race.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她逼自己完成比賽。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Being number 1,000,000,000 in a sequence.

examples.sentence: The company celebrated their [billionth] sale.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 公司慶祝了他們的第一十億銷售

examples.sentence: He became the [billionth] visitor to the site.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他成為網站的第一十億位訪客

examples.sentence: They marked their [billionth] transaction this year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們今年標誌著第一十億筆交易

meanings.meaning_en_US: Recently created or discovered; not existing before.

examples.sentence: I bought a new car.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我買了一輛新車。

examples.sentence: She has a new job.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她有了一份新工作。

examples.sentence: We need new ideas for the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要為這個項目找到新點子。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A place where goods are sold to the public.

examples.sentence: I need to go to the [store] to buy groceries.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要去商店買雜貨

examples.sentence: The [store] opens at nine in the morning.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 商店早上九點開門

examples.sentence: She works at a clothing [store].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在一家服裝商店工作

meanings.meaning_en_US: The number following three.

examples.sentence: There are [four] seasons in a year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一年有四個季節。

examples.sentence: I need [four] apples.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要四個蘋果。

examples.sentence: The score was [four] to two.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 比分是四比二。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A small, often posable figure representing a human or anthropomorphic creature.

examples.sentence: The little girl played with her favorite [doll].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 小女孩在玩她最喜歡的玩偶。

examples.sentence: He collected vintage [dolls] from various countries.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他收集來自不同國家的復古玩偶。

examples.sentence: She dressed her [doll] in a beautiful gown.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她給她的玩偶穿了一件漂亮的禮服。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A type of excavation in the earth from which minerals and other substances are extracted.

examples.sentence: The workers descended into the [mine] to extract coal.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 工人們下到礦山提取煤炭。

examples.sentence: They discovered a rich [mine] of precious stones.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們發現了一個富含珍貴寶石的礦山。

examples.sentence: The [mine] was closed due to safety concerns.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 由於安全問題，這個礦山已經關閉。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The organ of vision; the faculty of seeing.

examples.sentence: She has beautiful [eyes] that sparkle.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的眼睛閃閃發光，十分漂亮。

examples.sentence: He caught her [eye] across the crowded room.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在擁擠的房間裡注意到了她的眼神。

examples.sentence: Close your [eyes] and relax.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 閉上眼睛，放鬆。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having a significant distance between opposite sides; not thin.

examples.sentence: The book has a [thick] cover.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這本書有一個厚厚的封面。

examples.sentence: He wore a [thick] sweater in the winter.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在冬天穿了一件厚毛衣。

examples.sentence: The fog was so [thick] that we couldn't see far.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 霧太濃了，我們無法看得很遠。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Soiled or unclean; not clean.

examples.sentence: The kitchen was [dirty] after cooking.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 廚房在烹飪後變得骯髒。

examples.sentence: He wore a [dirty] shirt to the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他穿著一件骯髒的襯衫參加會議。

examples.sentence: The dog rolled in the mud and got [dirty].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 狗在泥巴裡打滾，變得骯髒。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A married man; a man in relation to his spouse.

examples.sentence: Her [husband] is a great cook.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的丈夫是一位出色的廚師。

examples.sentence: My [husband] and I are going on vacation next month.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我丈夫和我下個月要去度假。

examples.sentence: He is a dedicated [husband] and father.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是一位敬業的丈夫和父親。
